alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morrill County through 700 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, or 33 miles south of Alliance, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Northport, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 and Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
